title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' has no effect in new pdf emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, it does not take effect.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should hide the item in the new pdf emitter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the document. 
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label. 
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none' in the properties view. 
4. Observe that the label is still visible in the new pdf emitter.
